bucket_descriptions.freshman_overloaded: Student segment balancing academic demands and social-media exposure.
bucket_descriptions.upperclassman_procrastinator: Student segment balancing academic demands and social-media exposure.
bucket_descriptions.grad_student_burnout: Student segment balancing academic demands and social-media exposure.
bucket_descriptions.commuter_student_fragmented: Student segment balancing academic demands and social-media exposure.
bucket_descriptions.student_creator_distraction: Student segment balancing academic demands and social-media exposure.

personas.name: Noah Allen
personas.relevant_history: Scrolling spikes during exam and assignment crunch periods.
personas.in_their_voice: I need this to fit real student life and exam weeks.

personas.name: Emma Baker
personas.relevant_history: Uses social channels for class logistics, making total deletion impractical.
personas.in_their_voice: I still need social apps for classes, so hard bans are unrealistic.

personas.name: Liam Chen
personas.relevant_history: Has tried timers and app limits, but break windows often overrun.
personas.in_their_voice: Help me avoid late-night loops before morning lectures.

personas.name: Olivia Allen
personas.relevant_history: Needs a routine compatible with campus schedules and group work.
personas.in_their_voice: If classmates can keep me accountable, I follow through better.

personas.name: Ava Baker
personas.relevant_history: Experiences focus fragmentation between classes and transit.
personas.in_their_voice: I need fewer spirals, not another strict streak rule.

personas.name: Elijah Chen
personas.relevant_history: Responds best to peer accountability from classmates.
personas.in_their_voice: Make this practical for campus routines and project work.
